content: 550 Euros is still below my expectations, but I'm willing to consider it if you're a reliable tenant. How long are you planning to rent the apartment for? Long-term tenants usually get a better rate.

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm looking to rent the apartment for at least one year, with the possibility of extending if all goes well. I'm very committed to maintaining a long-term relationship as a tenant, and I'm sure I can be a reliable and respectful resident.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
